- [ ] get transactions

call

```shell
curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getBlockByNumber","params":["0x662D15", true],"id":1}'  https://kovan.infura.io/*infura_token*
```

response


```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "id": 1,
  "result": {
    "author": "0x007733a1fe69cf3f2cf989f81c7b4cac1693387a",
```

- [ ] get transaction from block


call

```shell
curl -X POST --data '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceipt","params":["0x0062bb50e3e9e74e2a22f7b0aa2a33c2a634f03b66797dec2719b1577605d35e"],"id":1}'  https://kovan.infura.io/*infura_token*
```

resonse

```json
{
  "jsonrpc": "2.0",
  "result": {
    "blockHash": "0x466baf77f35a4f1e70673c12fc2adb0219013f8ce844f95886c78c18f1160d74",
```

- [ ] encode erc20 token events
- [ ] if topic match ^ save user address
- [ ] maintain balances list and realtion to logs
- [ ] maintain alowance list and realtion to logs
